strings.description: A turtle of sparkling gold. It is known to provide good luck, and was even used as a form of currency for a time. Due to its beauty and rarity, it still fetches as fine a price at stores as any gem or ingot. In wealthy circles, it is not uncommon to hear tiresome vulgarians bragging about how many Mini Gil Snappers they keep, as a way of flaunting their affluence. Rumors even tell of a competition, held somewhere in the world, to find the most beautiful specimens.
strings.summon: I go with humans...humans feed me, yes?
